name: The Midnight Brew
description:
Welcome to the Midnight Brew---a late night jazz bar, deep in the heart of the forest...

Meet the Night Shift Crew:

Aliya Lee - Environment Art, Character Concept Art, Character Animation, Prop Design

Allan Hernandex - Music

Brandon Hutson - Programming

Christa Gallegos - Concept Art, Creature Art, Pixel Art, Animation, UI Art, Sound Effects

Daniel Martinez Murillo - Animation, Pixel Art, Programming, Design

John Mai - Concept Art, Narrative Writing, UI Design, UI Programming

Julian Gay - Lead Programming, System Programming, Music

Sam Chandler - UI Programming, Programming
